title: How to Make Artichoke and Potato Soup

steps.headline: Chop up your potatoes and artichokes quite finely.
Put the olive oil and about a teaspoon of garlic into a saucepan and start heating it up at whatever speed your comfortable with.
Throw in the onions nicely chopped and chilled.
Let them cook a little while in the olive oil until the soften nicely.
Add the potatoes and stir slowly.
Put the chicken stock and six cups of water into the saucepan and stir rapidly not allowing the ingredients to stick.
Let it all cool down for about ten minutes.
Place parsley or even basil on the top and serve.

text: Chop up your potatoes and artichokes quite finely.  Put the olive oil and about a teaspoon of garlic into a saucepan and start heating it up at whatever speed your comfortable with.  Throw in the onions nicely chopped and chilled.  Let them cook a little while in the olive oil until the soften nicely.  Add the potatoes and stir slowly.  Put the chicken stock and six cups of water into the saucepan and stir rapidly not allowing the ingredients to stick.  Let it all cool down for about ten minutes.  Add the artichoke.  Puree all the mixture.  Place parsley or even basil on the top and serve.  Finished.
